rows.label: qst001101_msg001
rows.name:
Hmmm... If I tweak this bit
like that...

rows.label: qst001101_msg002
rows.name: ...then this bit'll go like this...

rows.label: qst001101_msg003
rows.name:
Yeah! That's the one!
I'm a genius!

rows.label: qst001101_msg004
rows.name: Huh? Who are you lot?

rows.label: qst001101_msg005
rows.name:
Oh, is that right. Figures why I
wouldn't recognize you, then.

rows.label: qst001101_msg006
rows.name: They call me Chulev.

rows.label: qst001101_msg007
rows.name:
I'm really into smithing. I leave all that
buying, selling, wheeling and dealing to
the youngsters.

rows.label: qst001101_msg015
rows.name:
If there's something you want me to
knock up for you, just let me know.
Always looking for new ideas.

rows.label: qst001101_msg016
rows.name: Oh, but what am I doing?!

rows.label: qst001101_msg017
rows.name:
I almost clean forgot about the
brilliant idea I just had!

rows.label: qst001101_msg018
rows.name:
Well, the thing is... I just came up
with an idea for a new accessory.

rows.label: qst001101_msg019
rows.name:
When it's complete, it'll be the first of
its kind!

rows.label: qst001101_msg020
rows.name:
But I'm, uh, a bit short on some
of the things I need for it.

rows.label: qst001101_msg021
rows.name:
Maybe you could go gather 'em up for
me? 'Course, I'll let you have one, after
I've made it.

rows.label: qst001101_msg022
rows.name:
I'm not in this for the profit anyhow.
I just really love making things.
So, how's about it?

rows.label: qst001101_msg023
rows.name:
Oh! You'll help me out, will ya? Thanks!
Good to see there's still a few
enterprising youngsters out there!

rows.label: qst001101_msg024
rows.name:
So what I need is a Pione Stone
and some Gorilla Hair Bristle.

rows.label: qst001101_msg025
rows.name:
Pione Stone's easy enough to find.
Invidia's a pretty rocky place.

rows.label: qst001101_msg026
rows.name:
Gorilla Hair Bristleは××で
●●を倒せば採れるかもしれんの

rows.label: qst001101_msg027
rows.name: Thanks for dealing with that.

rows.label: qst001101_msg101
rows.name:
You'll find Pione Stones in
rocky areas of Invidia.

rows.label: qst001101_msg102
rows.name:
Gorilla Hair Bristleは××で
●●を倒せば採れるかもしれんの

rows.label: qst001101_msg103
rows.name:
I'll wait here for as long as it takes you.
Well, or till I die. Nobody lives forever!

rows.label: qst001101_msg201
rows.name:
海トカゲの鱗(仮)は××で
△△を倒せば
採れるはずじゃ

rows.label: qst001101_msg202
rows.name:
海鳥の羽根(仮)は××で
■■を倒せばいいだろう

rows.label: qst001101_msg203
rows.name:
Bring me that stuff and I'll kit you out
with a one-of-a-kind accessory!
